full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Interior and Exterior Renovations, Two Hills, AB

**Reference Number:** cb-5685-86421252
**Solicitation Number:** M5000-22-5579/A

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Project Overview**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to perform interior and exterior renovations on two government buildings in Two Hills, Alberta. This project involves renovations categorized into two main parts:

#### Interior Renovations (Building 1)
This scope encompasses the replacement of flooring materials, kitchen cabinetry, countertops and floors, as well as the installation of new windows, ceiling lights, and doors.

#### Exterior Renovations (Building 2)
This scope includes the replacement of walkways, exterior stairs, parking pad, and grading adjustments.

**Duration and Timeline**
The project timeline is as follows:

* Expected Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected End Date: Not Specified
* Completion Date: October 31, 2023

**Evaluation Criteria and Tender Details**
This tender is an Invitation to Qualify, which will be followed by a Request for Qualifications (RFQ). Following the first phase, the pre-qualified bidders will be invited to submit a financial bid on the project. The contract will be awarded to the lowest compliant bidder.

**Qualification and Evaluation Criteria**
Evaluation criteria include:

* Technical capacity
* Management capabilities
* Integrity and compliance with RCMP policies

**Security and Pre-Qualification Requirements**
Security clearances and other pre-qualification requirements must be met before submitting a quote.

**Contact Information**
Submission instructions and tender documents can be found online at [canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Questions or inquiries can be directed to:

* Lombardo, Rosa
* Contract Specialist
* RCMP
* Procurement & Contracting services
* Commissionaires, F Division
* 6101 Dewdney Avenue
* Regina, SK S4P 3K7
* Phone: (306) 780-5232
* Fax: (306) 780-5232

**E-Sourcing and Procurement Strategy**
The RCMP utilizes the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for easering tender issuance. Bidders can access documents via https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities
